assets.title: LEO above Kepler 22-B ver A
assets.comments: Our hero ship, drifting in low orbit over Kepler 22-B. Aiming for a realistic depiction of what a ship meant for interplanetary exploration might look like, as well as testing compositing custom gfx onto an AI generated image.

assets.title: Nanobots in the blood stream
assets.comments: For our ending montage of the various technologies at play here, a take on what the nano bots might look like, and how they might behave. They locate a damaged red blood cell, and inject a healing serum into it, returning it to a normal state.

assets.title: Cybernetic Arm in use
assets.comments: Another shot for our ending montage of tech. Showing a patient using his cybernetic limb for the first time.

assets.title: Cryo Sleep Pod Activation Sequence
assets.comments: Eli in cryposleep. Image generated in LTX using Gemini's nanobanana; video generated in LTX using Veo 2.

assets.title: Eli wakes up
assets.comments: Image generated in LTX using Gemini's nanobanana; video generated in LTX using Veo 2.

assets.title: LEO above Kepler 22-B ver B
assets.comments: An alt of our hero ship, drifting in low orbit over Kepler 22-B. Aiming for a realistic depiction of what a ship meant for interplanetary exploration might look, something a bit larger and more futuristic.

assets.title: CryoPod interface Ver A
assets.comments: A very basic generation of the computer interface for the sleep pods. In actual production, this will most likely have to be recreated in more traditional design software so we have full control over all the text and animation, but this is a good jumping off point for look development.

assets.title: CryoPod interface Ver B
assets.comments: Another very basic generation of the computer interface for the sleep pods.

assets.title: Sleep Pod Corridor Ver A
assets.comments: A version of what a corridor that houses the long term cryo sleep pods from the not so distant future. We wanted something that felt like it could exist today.

assets.title: Sleep Pod Corridor Ver B
assets.comments: An alt version of what a corridor that houses the long term cryo sleep pods from the not so distant future.

assets.title: Sleep Pod Corridor Ver C
assets.comments: An alt version of what a corridor that houses the long term cryo sleep pods from the not so distant future. This one feels like it is slightly further off into the future, when the technology is more mature.

assets.title: Sleep Pod Corridor Ver D
assets.comments: An alt version of what a corridor that houses the long term cryo sleep pods from the not so distant future. This one feels like it is even further off into the future, when the technology is fully mature.
